text:
As an example in Excel, if I put borders on cells C3:E3 and then merge them, the internal left and right borders are cleared.  If I save the file, POI reads those borders as zero.  Consistent with this, if the cells are un-merged in Excel, the internal borders do not re-appear.  The same applies when spanning rows.

The original description was unclear, but it is possible that the bug reporter expected the borders of any cell to report the same as that of the whole merged region.

Retested OK in svn trunk (post 3.1)
